Detailed Description

Abstract particle effector class.

This is an abstract base class for creating particle effectors.

See also:
PhParticleSystem(), PhParticle(), PhEmitter()

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

phoenix::PhEffector::PhEffector ( PhParticleSystem *  p = NULL  ) 

Constructor.

Default constructor, it sets partsys to NULL. In order for your effector to work, you must add it to a particle system by calling PhParticleSystem::addEffector() in your overloaded constructor.

virtual phoenix::PhEffector::~PhEffector (  )  [virtual]

Destructor.

The default destructor calls PhParticleSystem::removeEffector() if partsys is not null. Please note that if you delete an instance of this class without removing it from the particle system you will get a segfault.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void phoenix::PhEffector::preStep (  )  [inline, virtual]

Pre step function.

This function is called once per frame in PhParticleSystem::onPreRender().

See also:
step()

virtual void phoenix::PhEffector::step (  )  [pure virtual]

Post step function.

This function is called once per frame in PhParticleSystem::onPostRender().

See also:
preStep()
